alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 1:05PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Stronger Winds Along the Coast Next Few Hours... A wake low has developed behind the departing cluster of showers and thunderstorms now over the western Florida Panhandle and northern Gulf of Mexico. A few hours of winds sustained between 20 and 25 mph, with gusts up to 35 mph are expected along coastal Alabama and the western Florida Panhandle. These winds will also impact coastal locations along Mobile Bay, Perdido Bay, Pensacola Bay, and Choctawhatchee Bay. These winds will persist for a few hours this afternoon and evening as they spread eastward. Please exercise caution if in a small craft and consider heading back to port. Also these winds may blow around any loose objects. These strong winds should gradually diminish later this afternoon and evening.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
